statements.statement: Users tend not to be visible during development
Software developers have little experience accommodating accessibility needs
Accessibility does not occur to developers
Expense prevents accessibility being built into software
Time pressure prevents accessibility being built into software
Some organizations do not focus on accessibility
Accessibility not part of the cybersecurity feature design process
Software developers focus on privacy and security compliance not accessibility
Software developers are particularly aware of vision impairments
Software developers accommodate colour blind users
Software developers ensure that text is readable
Software developers ensure that multiple languages are available
Software Developers not given accessibility directives
Businesses do not value accessibility
Quality Control focuses on functionality when assessing software
Quality Control focuses on features when assessing software
Accessibility is seen as an add on in software development
Accessibility not a consideration during software specification writing
It is difficult to test for accessibility/inclusivity
There are no accessibility/inclusivity tools for software developers to use
Software Developers build software for themselves
Disabled Software Developers are accommodated
Usability testing is used to ensure ease-of-use of features
Software Specifications should include accessibility requirements
Quality Control should check accessibility requirements
Usability testers should check accessibility requirements
UX designers should check accessibility requirements
Regulations should enforce accessibility requirements
Usability testing does not ensure accessibility
Software requirements seldom include accessibility requirements
Software requirements seldom include inclusivity requirements
Accessibility and Inclusivity are the same thing
Awareness of the need for accessibility and inclusivity needs to come from the top
Software specifications do not include accessibility requirements
Software clients seldom mandate accessibility
